title: Docker Plugins & Integrations
description: Learn about Docker plugins, extensions, and integrations with other DevOps tools
learningObjectives: Explore Docker integrations with CI/CD tools

content.introduction: Docker's plugin system allows extending its functionality with third-party tools and custom integrations.

sections.title: Docker Plugin Types
sections.content: Docker supports various plugin types including volume, network, authorization, and log drivers.
sections.codeExample:
# List installed plugins
docker plugin ls

# Install a plugin
docker plugin install store/sumologic/docker-logging-driver:1.0.0

# Enable a plugin
docker plugin enable sumologic/docker-logging-driver:1.0.0

sections.title: Popular Integrations
sections.content: Common Docker integrations include monitoring (Prometheus, Grafana), CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab), and orchestration (Kubernetes, Docker Swarm).
sections.codeExample:
# Docker with Prometheus monitoring
docker run -d \
  --name prometheus \
  -p 9090:9090 \
  -v prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml \
  prom/prometheus

exercises.title: Install and Configure a Plugin
exercises.description: Install a Docker logging plugin and configure a container to use it
tasks: Configure a container to use the plugin
